content:
My first paper on UAV control was published in Applied and Computational Engineering Vol.9. Before that, this paper had been accepted by CONF-MSS 2023.
This simple work made me get initial knowledge of research process and publications.
I received my bachelor's degree in Mechatronics Engineering from College of Mechanical and Vehicle Engineering (MVE), Chongqing University.

I got my intra-school exchange certificate from National Elite Institute of Engineering (NEIE), Chongqing University.
Besides, my graduation thesis Optimization of Laser Cutting Process Parameters Based on Vision Inspection was awarded as the outstanding undergraduate graduation design (thesis) of NEIE.
I obtained an intra-school exchange opportunity to National Elite Institute of Engineering (NEIE), Chongqing University, majoring in Intelligent Manufacturing.

My first patent named A garbage sorting device with FPGA and ARM had been granted authorization. It was enjoyable to work with partners from Fuzhou University (FZU).
In this project, I was responsible for the mechanical design of this garbage sorting device.

I was assigned to Mechatronics Engineering during the discipline split-flow process.
In this year, School of Automotive Engineering was integrated into College of Mechanical and Vehicle Engineering (MVE).
I started my bachelor in Mechanical Engineering at School of Automotive Engineering, Chongqing University.
